description: Try our easy to follow Citrus Prawn Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Citrus Prawn Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together 200g small prawns with cream cheese or soft goat’s cheese, salt and black pepper, grated zest of 1 lemon, and a small handful of chopped herbs such as chervil, dill, chives, and basil. Heat a large dry frying pan and warm through 3 large tortillas quickly, one at a time, on both sides. Spread the prawn mixture over the surface and roll up as tightly as possible. Wrap in cling film and refrigerate until needed. Slice each wrap into 6-7 pieces on a sharp angle to serve.
